title: BUG - Runepage selection doesn't get saved and defaults to fallback rune-page.
body:
Ever since the new updates I've experience an intermittent yet extremely frustrating bug when attempting to lock and confirm my runes.

I've only ever experienced this playing ARAM but sometimes after configuring my runes/masteries and saving my selection - when the game loads it is defaulting me back to one of the default Inspiration rune pages.

Even though my rune page shows my newly configured page selected.
